website_summaries.verdict: Gives practical advice for common bumps in the road while encouraging parents to set realistic expectations and make peace with their limitations.
pros: Helps create a clear vision of your homeschool calling
Reminds you to start with your goal in mind and stay focused
Practical tips for challenging situations such as wide age gaps, distracting toddlers, and special needs learners
Even veterans can benefit from this refresher
cons: Gives some practical advice, but focuses more on faith than concrete details of schooling

customer_reviews.title: Lacks advice, oomph, or interest.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I was deeply underwhelmed. Reads like a paper, lacks heart and the advice is all things anyone who exists has heard before (like try giving your kids options, groundbreaking). I follow the author on social media, but this was a hard swing and a miss from her and Moody. It was a draggy read that I kept falling asleep to. You know when you're talking with a friend and accidentally zone out after a long long story? You begin to nod, utter "mmhmm" over and over, and kind of glaze over? This is the book equivalent of those conversations. 2 stars because I like the author personally, this book just lacks any heart or actual oomph for homeschooling bravely.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Must read for all homeschooling moms
customer_reviews.text: This book is a must read for all homeschooling moms and those just beginning to contemplate homeschooling. Jamie shares wisdom garnered over years of homeschooling with grace, wit, and humor.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kerzman

customer_reviews.title: So Much encouragement for Christian parents who are homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to read this book! We've been homeschooling officially for 3 years, and there are still so many ways that fear and doubt can creep into our decisions. Jamie has so much experience, and So Much encouragement for Christian parents who are homeschooling. I wanted to include an inspiring quote, but I can't copy in the whole book! If you homeschool, are thinking about it, or have a friend who does and you wonder why she does, This Book Is A MUST READ!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CMF

customer_reviews.title: Encouraging and engaging look at homeschooling today
customer_reviews.text: I loved this book! As I was preparing to begin another year of homeschool Jamie's words were such an encouragement to me. I was reminded why this is the right choice for our family and how to speak to the doubts and fears that can easily creep in to my heart. Full of biblical wisdom and also practical tips from a seasoned homeschooler. I appreciated the moments of humor throughout the book as well as the call to press on. I read this at the perfect time and encourage all homeschool parents to pick this up as they prepare for another academic year.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Herberger

customer_reviews.title: My apprehension melted away as I read this book!
customer_reviews.text: Jamie Erickson presents an excellent bible-backed perspective on what homeschooling should truly be about. As a mom who has no homeschool experience with a child beginning homeschool this fall, I felt a lot of my apprehensions and pre-conceived ideas melt away and be replaced by confidence and excitement for the years ahead. I've been recommending this book to all of my mom friends, it is a wonderul must-read book!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Snavely

customer_reviews.title: An encouraging read
customer_reviews.text: I loved this book! It felt like I was having coffee with a dear friend as I read it. This book is a wonderful encouragement to moms who are just starting out with homeschooling or veterans who have some years under their belts. Everyone will find something they can relate to. It is definitely one I plan to keep on the shelf and will pass along to friends to encourage them along the way.
customer_reviews.author: thesavants08

customer_reviews.title: It’s my new favorite homeschooling book!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book!!! It’s such an encouraging book for Christian Homeschooling moms. Chapter 12 is my favorite so far. Most moms doubt what they do and why they are doing it, this book is a wonderful pick me up. I have been homeschooling for six years now and it’s a wonderful book for new homeschooling moms and veteran homeschooling moms. I will definitely be pulling this book out yearly if not twice a year. It’s my new favorite Homeschooling book!
customer_reviews.author: BatMom

customer_reviews.title: The courage you need
customer_reviews.text: This book will give you the courage to homeschool bravely! It debunked many of my homeschool fears and used research to back itself up. She doesn't say homeschooling is for everyone, which I appreciated. She also clearly outlined some ideas for homeschooling older children while little ones are still around. She speaks as a mom who's homeschooling five children. She's had to face opposition along the way and has considered giving up. But she gives hope to those ready to throw in the towel on what got her through. I highly recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: encouraging & relatable
customer_reviews.text: As a homeschool mom to many, this was an inspiring read. Jamie gives solid, practical advice, but more than that she helps readers to better understand our own value as a homeschool parents and our individual calls to homeschool. She also shows us that we are all truly equipped to take on this task, even when we may not feel that way. She intertwines personal and funny stories that are relatable, as well as her struggles that made me feel immediately at ease and not alone. I recommend this book to any homeschool parent who needs a good dose of sweet encouragement from a trusted friend!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Vreeland

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a first year homeschooler, but it’s still hard for me to brave in the face of doubters and naysayers. This book has helped me realize that I am more than capable of giving my children a great education and I have no reason to be ashamed or embarrassed of our choice, no matter who disagrees. A must read!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The Encouragement I Needed.
customer_reviews.text: Homeschooling is hard! We have homeschooled on and off throughout the past 5 years. The "off" years were because my mind was filled with doubt and discouragement. The "what if's" never let me alone. I constantly worried about failing them. This book is a gift; A light in a dark tunnel of unknown. Jamie has encouraged and uplifted me in so many ways. I read and reread the pages feeling the confidence and whispers that I am made to do this, I can do this. SO grateful for her effort to spread this message because each and every homeschooling mom feels the weight of this work. Fabulous writing! Get a copy!
customer_reviews.author: Ang70370

customer_reviews.title: Reaffirm Your Choice to Homeschool
customer_reviews.text: This book is like chatting with a close friend who is a homeschooling veteran. Jamie provides reaffirming perspectives and comforting ideas surrounding our choice to homeschool our children and the criticism we inevitably face from time to time. Supported by scripture, Jamie explains how God has planned out this journey for us.
customer_reviews.author: SJMeadows

customer_reviews.title: May Be the best Homeschool Book I've read!
customer_reviews.text: The wisdom and truth Jamie shares in this books is something I think every homeschool mom needs to hear. Whether you are thinking about homeschooling or been homeschooling for 10 years, I think this book is wonderful for every mom to read! I just love the message of homeschooling bravely, doing it the way God designed for us each to do as an individual!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jardin

customer_reviews.title: This book is a blessing
customer_reviews.text: So grateful I’ve found this book as we prepare to start Kindergarten as a homeschooling family. Its Christ centered testimonies and discussions helped me feel more grounded and confident in our family’s choice to home educate. The facts presented in favor of homeschooling, quotes from successful like-minded parents and scriptures sprinkled throughout were uplifting and a reminder to have faith in myself. I loved it so much I sent another copy to my dear friend as she embarks on the same journey.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazingly encouraging. I have highlighted over and over! I have just recently decided to start to homeschool my 6 year old, and I have a 4 year old and a baby who is 5 months now. This is my second week homeschooling and THIS BOOK HAS BEEN SUCH AN ENCOURAGEMENT!! It is EVERYTHING that God has been already speaking into me. So much Biblical truth in it to stand on, and I am only on chapter 6! That is not even half way through the book! 100% a must read for the mama who is needing encouragement or direction!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great confidence builder
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this book. It’s given me the confidence I needed to help me to be a better homeschool mom. It has tons of great tips and relatable advice. For sure a must read for anyone who is scared to homeschool or is in a rut of not feeling good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: SO encouraging for any homeschooling mom!
customer_reviews.text: So many of us have doubts about homeschooling- will my kids learn what they need to/fall behind/ make friends...This book addresses these doubts and encourages us to look beyond ourselves and to God's direction and calling for our lives. I loved how this book is applicable to many different homeschooling styles, and, while it isn't a how-to book, it troubleshoots some possible problems.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Every homeschooling parent needs to read!
customer_reviews.text: This book is incredible!!! She covers all of year fears in homeschooling! So much Biblical truth in this book. Probably my favorite book on homeschooling! I feel a great sense of confidence now!
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book for any homeschooling parent. Although I feel very equipped and supported in my homeschooling journey I still gleaned nuggets of information in each chapter! This is definitely a book I will be recommending to friends. It touches on both spiritual and practical side of homeschooling. this is definitely a book I will be recommending to friends. It touches on both spiritual and practical side of homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: The Modern Homeschooler

customer_reviews.title: A must-read for any Christian homeschooling family
customer_reviews.text: As a veteran homeschool mom, I was not sure how helpful this book would be to me. It greatly exceeded all of my expectations! Jamie shares the perfect combination of encouragement, humor, and practical how-to's, and addresses all kinds of issues and concerns to help you homeschool each child successfully every single year. I will be recommending this book to all of the Christian homeschool families that I know. You should get a copy for yourself and one to share!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Buy a copy! You will be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: Homeschool Bravely is a balm for the aching homeschool moms soul. It’s filled with stories of Jamie’s experiences, practical tips, and research to back it up; all packed up with a bit of the humor that oozes from Jamie’s heart. “A guilt-free year” was by far my favorite chapter! If you are a homeschool mama (or considering taking on the title) get a copy of this book and READ it! It will be well worth your time! I promise! #homeschoolbravely
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We are gearing up to homeschool next year, and this book has given me so much hope and a plan of action for when things grt tough. She lifts up our identity in Christ and His sovereignty as our hope in hard days and our homeschooling as an act of worship. I have been so blessed by this book! I also appreciate the beautiful layout of the book, and the quality of the paper is very nice, which makes it more enjoyable for me to read!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Recommending this book to every homeschool mom I know!
customer_reviews.text: After reading several books about homeschooling over the past few months (and enjoying all of them!), Homeschooling Bravely is my absolute favorite and at the top of my list to recommend to other homeschool parents! The Biblical mind set about homeschooling that is presented here is such a good reminder for new or veteran homeschoolers. Full of Biblical truth and encouragement - probably a book I will reread each summer before the new school year starts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Talks about God ALOT
customer_reviews.text: I’m on page 50 and I feel like this book is more about God than homeschooling. Literally every sentence has the word God in it or a proverb. I love to read about different families homeschooling journey but this one is just a little too much. It sounds like a preacher wrote it instead of a homeschooling mom.
customer_reviews.author: Gael

customer_reviews.title: An encouraging read
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this book. It was very encouraging for the homeschool mom who sometimes doubts herself. It is just the book to encourage you in your reasons to homeschool & carry on in your journey. I passed it on to a new homeschool mom when I was finished because I wished I'd had this book when I first started out rather than in my 7th year homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: This book completely reinspired me to keep on homeschooling despite my fears!
customer_reviews.text: The author was so real, open, and honest, and thorough in her reasoning why homeschooling has multiple benefits, and why the school system just can't compete, because mainly of our God-given right to raise and educate our children, with joy, and a little heart-ache too. She doesn't gloss it over but she strongly encourages and breathed new enthusiasm for me to continue my journey, but keeping fear behind me. Highly recommend this book to every homeschooling mom, especially the struggling ones!
customer_reviews.author: natalie oberlin

customer_reviews.title: Encouraging Homeschool Book!
customer_reviews.text: This book is probably my top pick for an encouraging homeschool book! I've read many over the last 6 years of my homeschooling career. This one was different though and touched me in a different way. I thoroughly enjoyed Jamie's writing style and the layout of the book! My favorite chapter was A Guilt-Free Year because let's be honest, us homeschool momma's constantly fight that guilt that Satan puts into our hearts day after day. Thank you Jamie for touching my heart through this book. It was an amazing read and it will be my #1 recommendation to all of my homeschooling mom friends!
customer_reviews.author: SaraCA

customer_reviews.title: A MUST-READ for any homeschooling parent!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this book! Chapter 2 alone has been such an encouragement to me. I appreciate Jamie’s writing style. It almost feels like we are drinking tea, sitting on couches in the sun room, having a heart-to-heart chat as I read. This book is just what you need, whether you’ve been in it for years, are a newbie, or simply contemplating homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Genuine & Real
customer_reviews.text: I love how genuine and real Jamie is here with her thoughts and battles about homeschooling. She has brought to life within myself what I actually battle with as well. With realizing my own fears, I now know I’m not the ONLY one with these thoughts. I highly recommend reading this book especially if you’re in the beginning stages of homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Renae

customer_reviews.title: A book to build a mom’s confidence!
customer_reviews.text: This book has been exactly what I needed to hear as a potential new homeschool mom. Her words seem to do exactly what the title says.. squash doubt, trust God and teach your child with confidence. I’m not there yet since we haven’t taken the leap, but I know if/when we do, I’ll turn to this book as a reference on the hard days, the celebration days, and everything in between. Thank you for writing this and allowing God to speak right to my heart through your words.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Page
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic book. I am so excited to share this with other mom's looking to home educate. The approach is so beautiful and encouraging. I definitely recommend this book to anyone looking to refresh their heart for homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: NMF

customer_reviews.title: This book changed the way I approach homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: This is a must read for anyone considering homeschooling or even someone deep in the trenches of homeschooling. It honestly should be required reading for any mom that chooses this path of education for their children.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Like a breath of fresh inspiration
customer_reviews.text: Truly the most encouraging book on homeschooling I have read in a long time. Trust me, whether you have been homeschooling for years or are just getting started, this book will breath fresh life into your passion to homeschool
customer_reviews.author: Rita Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Best homeschool book!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best book for homeschooling I’ve bought so far. Nearly every page is sprinkled with scripture to speak truth into your homeschooling journey and to squash doubt about your calling. Have a highlighter ready and read it annually!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary & Alea Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: A MUST read for new homeschool families!
customer_reviews.text: This book is my go to recommendation for new homeschool families! I have found it so encouraging and helpful. FULL of practical advice, wisdom, and truth!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: A must read for all homeschoolers
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful book is packed full of so much hope and encouragement for homeschooling moms (and dads) in all seasons and stages of their homeschooling journey. Jamie Erickson has a way of making you feel loved and uplifted, while her gentle words of truth will quickly remind you why you began this journey. This book will help you remember the beauty and joy in homeschooling when it is sometimes hard to see through the fears and doubts that creep in. This book is a treasure that will be read again and again!
customer_reviews.author: rthiesse

customer_reviews.title: Encouraging book
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a homeschool mom when I read the book. I was just thinking about it. Homeschooling seemed like a big job and there were definitely reservations. But this book gives you the feeling that you, too, can do it! I highly recommend this book to anyone seriously considering embarking on a homeschooling journey.
customer_reviews.author: tAMARA rIVERA

customer_reviews.title: The most helpful homeschooling book I’ve read.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this book. I had no idea what I was doing my first year of homeschooling. This book encouraged me, gave me strength, and the confidence I needed. I highly encourage this book to be read for those who are starting out—AND for those who need a refresher on homeschooling❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This book changed my entire perspective on homeschooling - I felt I was forced into it and I was filled with doubt whether or not I could do it...then I read this book. It is now the ONLY book I recommend to friends considering homeschooling. 💗
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dueringer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best homeschooling book I've read.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I just finished it yesterday. Definitely a book I will wear out during the homeschooling years. This book is great encouragement for all homeschoolers regardless of the style you choose.
customer_reviews.author: penfield2004

customer_reviews.title: Wordy
customer_reviews.text: Good overall message, but very wordy. I few like the first half of the book could have been summed up in less than 30 pages.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: Must read for any homeschool parent
customer_reviews.text: This book really transformed our homeschooling. I have gifted it to several moms I’ve met that are new to homeschooling or thinking of giving up. Really encouraging and love that it is intertwined with scripture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Encouraging and true!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t recommend enough!! This book is honest and true. Brings up super common homeschool momma fears and gives solutions and Godly encouragement. I’ve recommended many times already and will continue to do so! Five stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: betsy23

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So good. First time homeschooler and this gave me a lot of comfort in my abilities, because God.
customer_reviews.author: Mindi H

customer_reviews.title: Quick and encouraging read
customer_reviews.text: I was encouraged by the amount of scripture quoted in this book. I share many of the author's thoughts and found this book to be a little boost to get us through this year.
customer_reviews.author: CascadeMom

customer_reviews.title: Such an encouraging read!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I don’t doubt that I’m doing what God has called me to do, this book was such an encouragement to me! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: the butlers

customer_reviews.title: Encouragement found
customer_reviews.text: I Really liked this book. I can relate to a lot of it and found it encouraging.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Great Book!
customer_reviews.text: This book is an awesome encouragement to any homeschooling mom or dad. It really helps to put things into perspective and bring you back to your why. This is not a how-to homeschool book but rather a book that speaks to the heart of Christian homeschooling. It is definitely a book that I will keep on my shelf and come back to when I need some encouragement and focus.
customer_reviews.author: Chantell Sain

customer_reviews.title: Encouraging book about homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: Great encouraging book! Highly recommended for homeschool families to read.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Root

customer_reviews.title: A must-read for homeschooling families
customer_reviews.text: If you homeschool, you will be encouraged by this book. Jamie offers a great perspective and is an excellent speaker.
customer_reviews.author: mdjjsmemaw

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this book sooo much! We started our journey a few months ago and my momma heart has needed these words so much
customer_reviews.author: jblair

customer_reviews.title: GREATLY ENCOURAGED
customer_reviews.text: This book has encouraged my entire purpose in homeschooling!!! Only half read and most the book has been highlighted! Can’t wait to buy more books and hand out as gifts to other mamas who need to be encouraged! This book came at a perfect time in my homeschooling journey!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the better books out there
customer_reviews.text: Great book. Filled with scripture and great anecdotes. Highlighted so many things so far. A great read for someone just getting into homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very Encouraging
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this book. I found it to be super encouraging and a great perspective as I start my homeschooling journey.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Junk

customer_reviews.title: Inspiring for the homeschooling momma.
customer_reviews.text: This book is beyond what I expected. It’s an easy read, like talking to a friend. It’s inspiring, and one I’ll read again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bagby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Book!
customer_reviews.text: Much needed for a homeschool Mama! I resonated so much with this book! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Speaks to the heart
customer_reviews.text: This book was full of truth, encouragement, and conviction. Jamie offers Biblical perspective, practical steps, and a sense of commradery that refreshes the heart of a homeschool momma!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Book
customer_reviews.text: Love love this book! It is truly touching my life in so many ways!
customer_reviews.author: ShyannaHafley

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful for homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was looking for. It’s a good book if you’re looking for Bible verses and such. NOT helpful for homeschooling. So I was very disappointed. Going to return.
customer_reviews.author: McAdoo

customer_reviews.title: Encouraging and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: A great book to keep, you motivated and focused, I am adding it to my every summer read list
customer_reviews.author: ahensel

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: Great read, definitely not just for beginner homeschool moms! Very well written too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Homeschool Bravely: How to Squash Doubt, Trust God, and Teach Your Child with Confidence
